resources.string: You need to put your weight and height in
You need to put your weight in
You need to put your height in
I think your lying to me. Please put your real weight and height
You are starving, You need to go to see a doctor.
You are emaciated, You should visit doctor.
You are underweight, You should gain some weight.
You have good weight, very good, stay in shape.
You are overweight, You should eat less.
You are obese, You should stop eating to much and do some sports.
You have 2 degree obesity (clinical), You should visit doctor.
You have 3 degree obesity (extreme), You need to visit doctor.
